listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 3 Bedroom House for Rent in Burnaby Heights
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription:
This beautiful 2029 Sq Ft home is waiting for you! A patterned tiled foyer welcomes you to this home along with charming front parlour. Elegant & spacious dining room is perfect for dinner parties with recessed hutch area. Kitchen features maple cabinets, stainless steel appliances, a centre island and modern black countertops, greenhouse window & unique circular dining area with glassed roof to enjoy south light. Beside there is a very nice and private patio. Great Location! Close to playground, Gilmore Community School, Eileen Daily Pool & Recreation Centre, Hastings Heights neighbourhood shopping. A two minute walk to community shuttle bus stop with connections to downtown!

*Water Included

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: Gorgeous 7 Bedroom House for Rent in Shaughnessy
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: This is a gorgeous home on huge lot that offers over 5500 sqft of luxury living.  The home was built with top of the line materials, excellent workmanship, and careful attention to details. The main floor boasts an elegant Versace tiled entrance, double height foyer, elegant living and dining spaces, 10' high ceilings, gourmet kitchen with top of the line appliances, granite counter tops, and a huge wok kitchen.  Upstairs has 4 spacious bedrooms with ensuites and a majestic master retreat with walk in closet and huge ensuite. The basement has a huge rec. room, state-of-the-art theatre room, 2 bedrooms, sauna room, and super high ceilings. Features include crystal chandeliers, walnut wood flooring throughout, A/C,  crown molding, extensive use of marble and granite, high end security system, and a great backyard with huge deck, and hot tub. Walk to Shaughnessy Elementary School, York House, LFA, PW Sec.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 4 Bedroom Townhouse For Rent In South Surrey
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: Welcome to the highly coveted ABBEY ROAD, in South Surrey's most vibrant & desirable Grandview Heights. This 4BR, 3BA plan is full of upgrades including crown mouldings, premium  appliances, gas range, quartz countertops in kitchen & all bathrooms, wide laminate plank flooring, designer blinds, 9' ceiling on main floor & BONUS 4th bedroom with full bathroom on the entrance level that is perfect for teens, guests, an office or in-laws! The home is a short walk to new Grandview Heights Aquatic Centre & Morgan Crossing / Grandview Corners, for shopping, dining, entertainment & easy access to US border. Enjoy the Clubhouse with gym & party/meeting rooms.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: Furnished 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent in Richmond
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription:
Welcome to Hamptons Park, one of the most desirable communities perfect for young families. This unique & only suite feels like a townhouse with its own entrance & entertainment style 200 sqft of private patio space. This open 2 bedroom & 2 bathroom home features over 1100 sqft of living space with dedicated dining area, gourmet kitchen, high quality cabinetry, gas stove, granite counters, engineered floors, and 1 parking. Excellent facilities with indoor pool, club house, sauna/steam, gym & guest suites. Take an evening stroll to the Garden City park or take in tennis on the weekends this home has it all.

Please book a showing in the following link:
https://showmojo.com/l/392376a09a/6233-katsura-street-east-103-richmond-bc

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 3 Bedroom + Den House for Rent in Edgemont
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription:
This cozy 1,500 sq ft home is located on a quiet cul de sac just a short walk to Edgemont. Includes 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms,  a large family room with floor to ceiling fireplace just off the kitchen (all stainless steel appls incl) and master bedroom with a 3 pc ensuite.
Lots of storage, a sunny well maint. fenced yard for children makes this home great for a young family or empty nesters.
Only 10 minutes to Park Royal and downtown. Near Murdo Fraser Park.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 1 Bedroom Contemporary Laneway House for Rent in Point Grey
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription:
1 Bedroom Modern and Fully Independent Laneway House located in desirable Point Grey.
The house is above garage, no shared walls/floors with neighbours, private entrance. Extras include A/C, in-floor radiant heat, built in vac and Smart home. Call today and check it out, this one just might work well for you.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 3 Bedroom Main Floor Suite for Rent in Point Grey #1
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: High ceilings and expansive glass walls bring in tremendous natural light to this beautiful home. Open floor plan and high-end contemporary finishes include European fixtures to compliment the stunning kitchen with Italian cabinets and a Miele appliance package.  Extras incl A/C, in-floor radiant heat, built in vac and Smart home.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 2 Bedroom Beautiful Condo for Rent in Fraserview - Furnished
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: Beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath condo in desirable Tugboat Landing.This bright, clean and spacious unit offers an excellent layout with an open kitchen with eating area & in suite storage room. Features include maple hardwood floors, quartz kitchen countertops, stainless steel appliances, lighting, designer colors, gas fireplace! Entertainment size living/dining with large deck. Master ensuite has a generous soaker tub. Two parking stalls assigned to the unit. Living at Tugboat Landing is a lifestyle, not just a home. Great complex features excellent facilities including gym, hot tub and club house, perfect for entertaining. Transit, Canada Line, and parks & the river at your door step. 20 minutes to downtown. Excellent access points to Vancouver International Airport, Richmond & Burnaby. Come take a look, you'll be impressed!

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 4 Bedroom Modern House for Rent in Point Grey #1
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: Contemporary Home in desirable Point Grey. High ceilings and expansive glass walls bring in tremendous natural light to this 4-bedroom home. Open floor plan and high-end contemporary finishes include European fixtures to compliment the stunning kitchen with Italian cabinets and a Miele appliance package. The lower level is fully finished with a lovely family room and a legal one-bedroom suite. In addition there’s a legal one bedroom suite and a two level detached laneway house above the garage. Extras include A/C, in-floor radiant heat, built in vac and Smart Home.

listingsToBeAdded.postingTitle: 2 Bedroom Condo for Rent in Joyce Collingwood
listingsToBeAdded.postingDescription: This beautiful 2 bedroom penthouse with bright, open floor plan to has it all. Fully renovated with modern style kitchen and bathrooms, dark engineered flooring, built ins, s/s appliances, quartz countertops, heated floors and a 340 SF private patio with south, west & north facing views. Just one block to Joyce Skytrain Station and bus stop, close to the library, restaurants, parks and shopping in nearby Metrotown! It's a MUST SEE!
